column1: #Text=Toph says : " Tell me what you did wrong . "
#Text=Korra says : " Well , I was thinking that you were ... " Toph says : " Exactly !
#Text=Of all the Avatar 's I 've worked with , you 're by far the worst .
#Text=I know that 's only one other Avatar , but still .
#Text=It seems like you 're enjoying having someone around to beat up an awful lot .
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , the swampbenders out here really ca n't take a punch .
#Text=" Korra says : " So ... what made you want to drop out and disconnect from the rest of the world ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'm more connected to the world than you 've ever been !
#Text=The roots and vines ... they run all over the world .
#Text=I can see Su and Lin , Zaofu and Republic City .
